mapper.sql:
select ui.password , ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ui.registration_date , ss.reminder_volume , ss.system_settings_id , ss.font_size , ss.questionnaire_exported , ui.phone_number , ui.last_login_date , ui.username
FROM system_settings ss left join user_info ui on ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id
mapper.select:
select ui.password , ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 , ui.registration_date , ss.reminder_volume , ss.system_settings_id , ss.font_size , ss.questionnaire_exported , ui.phone_number , ui.last_login_date , ui.username
FROM system_settings ss left join
user_info
ui on ss.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}
